tool_description: Creates complete app store listings by combining metadata, screenshots, icons, and formatting them according to platform specifications.

platform.description: Target platform: ios, android, or both

app_title.description: App title for the store listing

pricing_model.description: Pricing model: free, paid, freemium, subscription

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be 'ios', 'android', or 'both'.
Description too long: Description exceeds platform character limits.
Invalid category: Category not supported for the specified platform.
Invalid age rating: Age rating not recognized for the platform.
Invalid pricing model: Must be 'free', 'paid', 'freemium', or 'subscription'.
Invalid email format: Contact email is not in valid format.
Missing screenshots: At least one screenshot is required.
Icon validation failed: Provided icon URL is not accessible or invalid.
usage: Provide all required parameters including app_title, descriptions, keywords, media assets, and app details. Optionally include privacy_policy_url. Returns formatted store listing ready for submission.

listing_preview.description: Preview of how the listing will appear in stores

character_counts.description: Character count validation for each text field

asset_validation.description: Validation status of all media assets

submission_ready.description: Whether the listing is ready for store submission

listing_id.description: Generated unique identifier for the listing
